elements.label: Depleting Levels
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 1</color></size>

The clock is beginning to tick.

elements.label: Shallow Breaths
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 2</color></size>

I must savor what air I hold in my longs, before I can hold no more.

elements.label: Empty tanks
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 3</color></size>

My body is aching for air and open space. The corners of my vision are beginning to shiver.

elements.label: Final Vapors
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 4</color></size>

Stars are beginning to dance in the darkness. Not long now. Not much longer at all.
